description.default: Pomodoro timer in status bar, block relationship graph, AI knowledge base Q&A, quick capture with camera, streaming AI, database backlinks, footer backlinks, text to citation, flashcard priority, document merging, periodic reminders, reading points, bidirectional linking, card deletion during review, flashcard image cloze, move to today's notes, clean up expired flashcards
